category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 36 (Handling and Management of Hazardous Substances)
contents: Article 36 (Handling and Management of Hazardous Substances) ① If the Corporation handles hazardous substances specified in Chapter 7 of the Industrial Safety Act, the Chairman shall conduct on-site safety management in accordance with the following items. Revised on December 22, 2021, 1. Directing work to prevent health problems, 2. Checking for abnormalities in ventilation equipment and monitoring the wearing of protective gear, ② The chairman shall place an order in places where people other than relevant workers handle hazardous substances subject to management. Measures must be taken to prevent entry, and a sign prohibiting entry must be posted in an easily visible place.
